heading: HR02112
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, WITH REGARD THE READINESS OF THE MIAA TO RESPOND TO EMERGENCIES AFTER THE XIAMEN AIR INCIDENT THAT PARALYZED THE OPERATIONS OF THE NINOY AQUINO INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT TO ENSURE THAT AIRPORT AUTHORITIES WILL BE MORE EFFECTIVE AND EFFICIENT IN RESPONDING TO SIMILAR INCIDENTS IN THE FUTURE
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-09-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02112
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, WITH REGARD THE READINESS OF THE MIAA TO RESPOND TO EMERGENCIES AFTER THE XIAMEN AIR INCIDENT THAT PARALYZED THE OPERATIONS OF THE NINOY AQUINO INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT TO ENSURE THAT AIRPORT AUTHORITIES WILL BE MORE EFFECTIVE AND EFFICIENT IN RESPONDING TO SIMILAR INCIDENTS IN THE FUTURE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-08-29
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2018-09-04
